info.title: CapabilityStatement[https://fhir.hl7.org.uk/STU3/CapabilityStatement/careconnect-api]
info.description: The Care Connect RESTful APIs within this site have been developed collaboratively by NHS Digital and the INTEROPen community. These APIs aim to better support the delivery of care by opening up information and data held across different clinical care settings through the use of nationally defined INTEROPen FHIR® resources.

/metadata.summary: Access to the Server's Capability Statement
/metadata.description: All FHIR Servers return a CapabilityStatement that describes what services they perform

get.summary: Return the server's capability statement

/AllergyIntolerance.summary: manage the collection of resources of type AllergyIntolerance
/AllergyIntolerance.description: Access to services to manage the collection of all resources of type AllergyIntolerance

get.summary: Search all resources of type AllergyIntolerance based on a set of criteria

/AllergyIntolerance/{rid}.summary: Read/Write/etc resource instance of type AllergyIntolerance
/AllergyIntolerance/{rid}.description: Access to services to manage the state of a single resource of type AllergyIntolerance

get.summary: Read the current state of the resource

ETag.description: Version from Resource.meta.version as a weak ETag

/Condition.summary: manage the collection of resources of type Condition
/Condition.description: Access to services to manage the collection of all resources of type Condition

get.summary: Search all resources of type Condition based on a set of criteria

parameters.name: clinical-status
parameters.description: The clinical status of the condition

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: A unique identifier of the condition record

/Condition/{rid}.summary: Read/Write/etc resource instance of type Condition
/Condition/{rid}.description: Access to services to manage the state of a single resource of type Condition

get.summary: Read the current state of the resource

ETag.description: Version from Resource.meta.version as a weak ETag

/DocumentReference.summary: manage the collection of resources of type DocumentReference
/DocumentReference.description: Access to services to manage the collection of all resources of type DocumentReference

get.summary: Search all resources of type DocumentReference based on a set of criteria

parameters.name: patient
parameters.description: Who/what is the subject of the document

parameters.name: period
parameters.description: Time of service that is being documented

parameters.name: setting
parameters.description: Additional details about where the content was created (e.g. clinical specialty)

/DocumentReference/{rid}.summary: Read/Write/etc resource instance of type DocumentReference
/DocumentReference/{rid}.description: Access to services to manage the state of a single resource of type DocumentReference

get.summary: Read the current state of the resource

ETag.description: Version from Resource.meta.version as a weak ETag

/Encounter.summary: manage the collection of resources of type Encounter
/Encounter.description: Access to services to manage the collection of all resources of type Encounter

get.summary: Search all resources of type Encounter based on a set of criteria

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: A date within the period the Encounter lasted

parameters.name: episodeofcare
parameters.description: Episode(s) of care that this encounter should be recorded against

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: Identifier(s) by which this encounter is known

parameters.name: patient
parameters.description: The patient ro group present at the encounter

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: planned | arrived | triaged | in-progress | onleave | finished | cancelled +

/Encounter/{rid}.summary: Read/Write/etc resource instance of type Encounter
/Encounter/{rid}.description: Access to services to manage the state of a single resource of type Encounter

get.summary: Read the current state of the resource

ETag.description: Version from Resource.meta.version as a weak ETag

/Organization.summary: manage the collection of resources of type Organization
/Organization.description: Access to services to manage the collection of all resources of type Organization

get.summary: Search all resources of type Organization based on a set of criteria

parameters.name: address-postalcode
parameters.description: A postal code specified in an address

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: Any identifier for the organization (not the accreditation issuer's identifier)

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: A portion of the organization's name or alias

/Organization/{rid}.summary: Read/Write/etc resource instance of type Organization
/Organization/{rid}.description: Access to services to manage the state of a single resource of type Organization

get.summary: Read the current state of the resource

ETag.description: Version from Resource.meta.version as a weak ETag

/Patient.summary: manage the collection of resources of type Patient
/Patient.description: Access to services to manage the collection of all resources of type Patient

get.summary: Search all resources of type Patient based on a set of criteria

parameters.name: address-postalcode
parameters.description: A postalCode specified in an address

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: A value in an email contact

parameters.name: family
parameters.description: A portion of the family name of the patient

parameters.name: given
parameters.description: A portion of the given name of the patient

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: A server defined search that may match any of the string fields in the HumanName, including family, give, prefix, suffix, suffix, and/or text

parameters.name: phone
parameters.description: A value in a phone contact

/Patient/{rid}.summary: Read/Write/etc resource instance of type Patient
/Patient/{rid}.description: Access to services to manage the state of a single resource of type Patient

get.summary: Read the current state of the resource

ETag.description: Version from Resource.meta.version as a weak ETag

/PractitionerRole.description: Access to services to manage the collection of all resources of type PractitionerRole

get.summary: Search all resources of type PractitionerRole based on a set of criteria

parameters.description: The identity of the organization the practitioner represents / acts on behalf of

parameters.name: practitioner
parameters.description: Practitioner that is able to provide the defined services for the organation

/Procedure.description: Access to services to manage the collection of all resources of type Procedure

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: A unique identifier for a procedure

/Procedure/{rid}.summary: Read/Write/etc resource instance of type Procedure
/Procedure/{rid}.description: Access to services to manage the state of a single resource of type Procedure

ETag.description: Version from Resource.meta.version as a weak ETag

summary.name: _summary
summary.description: Requests the server to return a designated subset of the resource

format.name: _format
format.description: Specify alternative response formats by their MIME-types (when a client is unable acccess accept: header)

pretty.name: _pretty
pretty.description: Ask for a pretty printed response for human convenience

elements.name: _elements
elements.description: Requests the server to return a collection of elements from the resource

count.name: _count
count.description: The maximum number of search results on a page. The server is not bound to return the number requested, but cannot return more
